title: Speaker NA urges nation to adopt precautionary measures against coronavirus
content:
ISLAMABAD, May 17 (APP):Speaker National Assembly Asad Qaiser Sunday urged the nation to continue to follow precautionary measures against the spread of coronavirus.
In a video message, he thanked Allah on his recovery and of his children from coronavirus.
“I am thankful to the whole nation for its love and prayers.”
He asked everyone to work for the welfare of the poor people.
He appreciated Prime Minister Imran Khan for his sagacious leadership at this critical time for the nation.
